items.title: Implement Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Develop an analytics dashboard within the project management tool to display key project metrics and performance indicators.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays at least 5 key metrics including project progress, task completion rate, and resource utilization.
Data on the dashboard updates in real-time or within a maximum delay of 5 minutes.
Users can filter metrics by project, team, and date range.
Dashboard is accessible from the main navigation menu.
dependencies: Project data collection and storage system
non_functional: Dashboard loads within 3 seconds under normal load
Supports responsive design for desktop and tablet devices
Ensures data accuracy with less than 1% error rate

notes: User requirement was high-level; assumed standard project management metrics and real-time updates as key features.
